common.longPressHint: Shisha omwanya omoreire nigo unyore obuya

splash.title: NASAKA
splash.subtitle: IEBC
splash.description: Ronderera Ebiro ria IEBC Eriri ovikiiri
splash.disclaimer: Etikira okumania gesera abo oire nigo ronde ebiro ria IEBC eriri ovikiiri ogende negosanie njira ya kogenda oko.
splash.locationBlockedDescription: Etikira okumania gesera mono oborora browser yako unachize khabiri

search.placeholder: Ronderera ebiro chia IEBC kwa kaunti, sitimuende, kana gesera...
search.findAllMatching: Ronderera ebiro biosi bia IEBC ebikaranyete
search.noMatchQuery: Tamona ebiro erikaranye "{{query}}". Gerera kwenda kwingi.
search.noOfficesInArea: Tamona ebiro bia IEBC gesera rao.

bottomSheet.locationAccessDesc: Etikira okumania gesera nigo urone amafaranga ekoragoseka kwa endia, ronde njira koma gesera raino, oronderere njira erikwiigana n'ebiro erio.
bottomSheet.trafficSurcharge: Okwongera Kwa Amafaranga Aini A Emigare
bottomSheet.confirmOffice: Avaanto bangakinya kwa kwetikira angai ebiro erio nirio
bottomSheet.within500m: Okwageke oko keri mono omogitiro kwa mita 500 chia ebiro
bottomSheet.oneConfirmation: Okwetikiria kono kweyemo gwa kila kifaa
bottomSheet.distanceAway: Ori omogitiro kwa mita {{distance}}. Sendera mono omogitiro kwa mita {{maxDistance}} chia ebiro nigo wetikire.
bottomSheet.confirmationFailed: Kotuma okwetikiria kwakora ekibi. Gerera khabiri.
bottomSheet.locationPermissionRequired: Okwetikiria kwa okumania gesera kochageke. Etikira okumania gesera ugerera khabiri.
bottomSheet.tapForGoogleMaps: Shisha ebiro nigo urone njira ya Google Maps.

layers.standardDesc: Omosura kwa karte ya migwato eke kavindo
layers.iebcOfficesDesc: Ebiro biosi bia IEBC mono Kenya yoosi
layers.constituenciesDesc: Emigitiro kwa chitimuende chia bunge na okotorana mono Kenya yoosi ta okurangirwe ni IEBC. Kila kirenge kigoneria sitimuende eyemo na nombari yano na eriitwa riano.
layers.healthcareFacilitiesDesc: Omogabanyio kwa ebisarakati bia obosaani mono nsi yoosi (amatampi amanene - angwate esembe ringi nigo akorwe)
layers.counties: Amatampi Ka Avatoori Ba Kaunti Mono Kenya
layers.countiesDesc: Omogabanyio kwa emigitiro kwa kaunti mono nsi yoosi
layers.myLocationDesc: Erana gesera rao raino mono karte
layers.aboutLayersDesc: Hindura chibirigi nigo wige omosura kao kwa karte. Otunganyi chibirigi chingi na karte chinga-ingi nigo urone gendaire.

contribute.title: Ongera Gesera Ria Ebiro Erikwisa
contribute.description: Tuteere okwandeka ebiro biosi bia IEBC mono Kenya yoosi kwa koongera amatampi amarangire kwa gesera.
contribute.googleMapsPlaceholder: Kwanya omogotaganio kwa Google Maps kana ebipimo
contribute.uploadEvidenceDesc: Ekifwani kie ebiro, ebikwania, kana gesera rieri ovikiiri riteerera okwetikiria
contribute.dragDropOrClick: Kurura uninge kana shisha nigo wekanwe
contribute.movePin: Kurura ekirikiti nigo wirengechie gesera riria erikwamanya
contribute.submissionSuccessDesc: Eketooria kao ketumirwe na kekororwe ni avaraangi.
contribute.submissionNote: Kerora: Okwetikiria kwa mokorano koteerera okogongera ekorangire. Mbwenu muno kwa koongera!
contribute.errorLocation: Tuma ebipimo bia gesera ria ebiro
contribute.errorInvalidCoordinates: Ebipimo tiabio amarangire. Rora latitude na longitude.
contribute.errorSubmissionFailed: Kotuma eketooria kao kwakora ekibi. Gerera khabiri.
contribute.errorLocationPermission: Okwetikiria kwa okumania gesera kwaregeirwe. Etikira okumania gesera.
contribute.errorLocationFailed: Koronderera gesera kwakora ekibi. Gerera koika ebipimo na omoko.
contribute.parseError: Omogotaganio tiabuo bwarangire. Kwanya omogotaganio bwarangire bwa Google Maps kana ebipimo.

uber.uberXDesc: Emigare kia buya buya amafaranga tware
